name: Volatile Penguin
description:
Activate the terminals hidden around the spike labyrinth and escape before you're caught in the self destruct sequence! Take it slow and easy, dying does not reset your progress. Good luck!

Made with Godot for the 2020 Secret Santa Jam.

Controls (gamepad / keybaord):

Dpad Left & Right / A & D: Rotate penguin

X & A / Space Bar: Activate jetpack

Music from: https://opengameart.org/content/generic-8-bit-jrpg-soundtrack

Font: https://www.dafont.com/lilian-2.font
